example-desc: This is an example extension using the BoilerPlate.
example-welcome-title-loggedout: Hey you there, today is a fine $2!
example-helloworld-intro: This is the HelloWorld special page, as provided by the Example extension.
apihelp-query+example-param-key: The 'key' parameter of the Example Query API.
da-transclusion-hash-ui-state-invalid: Invalid hash or verification data missing
da-transclusion-hash-ui-state-new-versio: New version of the resource available
da-transclusion-hash-ui-visit-latest: This section is not available on old revisions, visit '''latest revision''' to access it
da-specialdaconfig-desc: Configuration for the MediaWiki - Data Accounting Extension
da-specialdaconfig-softwareinfo:
Project GitHub: [$1 $1]
Data Accounting Version: $2
API Version: $3
Your Domain ID is: $4
da-specialdaconfig-signature-help: Content Signature adds a visible signature into the page content and write a new revision when signing a page with your wallet.
da-specialdaconfig-witnessconfiguration-: Configure Witness Network and Smart-Contract-Address for [[Special:WitnessPublisher| Domain Snapshot Publisher]]
Ensure you're generating a [[Special:Witness| Domain Snapshot]] before publishing.
da-export-field-latest-label: Include only latest revision of the page. If checked, only referenced revisions of transcluded resources will be exported
